mapper.update: update mentor_info set mentIf_state = 1 where mentIf_me_id = #{me_id}
update member set me_ma_auth = "멘토" where me_id = #{me_id}
update mentor_info set mentIf_state = -1 where mentIf_me_id = #{me_id}

update mentor_info set mentIf_exp = #{mt_info.mentIf_exp}, mentIf_portfolio = #{mt_info.mentIf_portfolio}, mentIf_intro = #{mt_info.mentIf_intro}, mentIf_account = #{mt_info.mentIf_account}, mentIf_date = now(), mentIf_ment_job = #{mt_info.mentIf_ment_job}, mentif_bank = #{mt_info.mentIf_bank}, mentIf_state = 0 where mentIf_me_id = #{me_id}
update mentoring set ment_title = #{ment.ment_title}, ment_duration = #{ment.ment_duration}, ment_content = #{ment.ment_content} where ment_num = #{ment.ment_num}

select * from mentor_info where mentIf_ment_job like concat("%",#{cri.search},"%") and mentIf_state = 0 order by mentIf_date DESC limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
select count(*) from mentor_info where mentIf_ment_job like concat("%",#{cri.search},"%")

SELECT mentoring.*, mentor_info.mentIf_ment_job as ment_mentIf_job, mentor_info.mentIf_exp as ment_mentIf_exp, mentoring_apply.mentAp_state as mentAp_state, me_nickname as ment_me_nickname FROM mentoring JOIN mentor_info ON ment_me_id = mentIf_me_id JOIN mentoring_apply ON ment_num = mentAp_ment_num JOIN `member` ON me_id = ment_me_id WHERE mentAp_me_id = #{me_id}
